name: Cryo - The Visual Novel
description:
This is a short, visual novel that provides a back-story to the eventual game Cryo.  It is to give context to the final game, Cryo.  If you've got 15 minutes, then play through it to get a hint as to what Cryo will be like.

Cryo, the game's description:

A terminally-ill man volunteers for an experimental cryogenics program in order to cure himself.  Instead of a cure, fantastic worlds reveal themselves to make Hell a reality for him.
